scripts.start: cd website && npm run docusaurus start
scripts.dev: cd website && npm run docusaurus start
scripts.clear: cd website && npm run docusaurus clear
scripts.start:fast: cd website && npm run docusaurus start -- --host 0.0.0.0 --no-open
scripts.serve:fast: cd website && npm run docusaurus build && npm run docusaurus serve --host 0.0.0.0 --no-open
